altTitles.ro: Aventurile Bizare ale lui JoJo Partea 8: JoJolion

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: JoJolion

altTitles.es: La extraña aventura de JoJo Parte 8: Jojolion

description.en:
Eighth story arc of JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken series.  
  
Following the Great East Japan earthquake, Morioh has been stricken by vast earthen protrusions known by the locals as Wall Eyes. Despite investigation, professional estimations are left empty. Meanwhile, the young girl Yasuho Hirose discovers a man buried within the ground, he possesses a distinctive star-shaped birthmark together with deeply penetrating bite marks. The man, who has contracted a staple case of amnesia is taken in by a local family and given the name Jousuke Higashikata, however mysterious events cannot stop from piling one upon the other and soon that enigma known as stand emerges to complement the great cloud of confusion.  
  
- Won the Grand Prize in the manga category at the 17th Japan Media Arts Festival in 2013.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.

description.en:
A high school 3rd year student, Miyamoto Dai, whose heart was touched by Jazz, continued to play the Saxophone alone in Kawahara, rain or shine, day or night, for many years. "I want to become the world's best Saxophone player…!!" Effort, talent, faith, environment, luck…which are necessary? A tale of reaching towards his goal recklessly and sincerely begins in Hirosegawa, Sendai.  

[Official Site](https://bluegiant.jp/) 

---
- English release by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/blue-giant/)  
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics (2018)

---
- **Won the 62nd Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga**
- **Won the 20th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga**
description.pt-br: Aluno do 3º ano, Miyamoto Dai, o qual teve seu coração tocado pelo Jazz, continua a tocar seu saxofone sozinho em Kawahara, seja chuva ou seja sol, dia ou noite, por vários anos. Com o desejo de ser o melhor músico de sax do mundo, do que ele mais precisa? Trabalho duro, esforço, fé, sorte? Esta é uma história sobre um jovem, em busca de seus objetivos.

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢たちは揺るがない

description.en:
It has been half a year since Aini Mikkola, the saintess in training who hails from a barony in the countryside, arrived at the Royal Academy. 

The school is in turmoil. 

The boys, the sons of aristocrats, are at the mercy of Aini's innocent, natural cuteness, while the girls are angry at her disregard for the manners of the aristocracy. In the midst of all this, there were three daughters who were dubbed “the villainesses,” in reference to a popular story. Seraphina, the crown prince's fiancée and the daughter of an upright marquise. Sandra, the noble daughter of a viscount who made their wealth from commerce. Bernardetta, the brilliant daughter of the current Prime Minister's who is a marquise. 

When a sense of disquiet begins to grow in the school, these women finally stand up! To correct Aini's mistakes and to follow their own hearts.

This is a record of the battle between the three “villainesses” and the saintly apprentices, a battle for the way of life of women.

description.fr: Un homme qui souffre d'insomnie depuis deux mois dérange accidentellement un serpent en hibernation. Le serpent veut manger l'homme et se prépare à le manger car la viande devient délicieuse après que toutes ces larmes versées. Que fera le serpent de ce festin ?

altTitles.en: I Made a Contract With Myself

description.en: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.

altTitles.es: La Chica Malvada Se Convierte En Emperatriz

description.en:
The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

[Alternative Official Raw: Kuaikan Manhua](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975)

altTitles.ja: レベル200最強盗賊の覚醒～終末世界で暴れ狂ってやる～

description.en: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
description.fr:
Un mouvement dans l'univers a apporté des mutations au niveau des espèces vivantes. Un poison, des morts vivants, des géants et des monstres rugissent dans la ville en agitant leurs armes. Alors que des bêtes dans les bois se battent pour des territoires, certains humains éveillent une capacité spéciale connue sous le nom de pouvoir des étoiles... Zhou Zheng, déficient de ce pouvoir, va traverser ce nouveau monde post apocalyptique.
Utilisant ses capacités de voleur issue d'un autre jeu, il détruit ténèbres et brouillard, à la recherche du pouvoir suprême !
description.zh: 一场宇宙风暴带来了物种的变异。城市中的毒尸巨怪，挥动着战斧咆哮。丛林中的异兽们，争夺着领地的主权。人类也觉醒了一种名为星力的异能……没有星力的周正穿越到这个末世。利用游戏中盗贼的角色能力，他将撕毁黑暗迷雾，追逐至高的力量！

altTitles.zh: 我成了反派大佬的小娇妻？！

altTitles.zh-hk: 我成了反派大佬的小嬌妻？！

altTitles.ja: 私は悪役の甘えん坊妻になりました

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo Cheng Le Fan Pai Da Lao De Xiao Jiao Qi?!

description.en: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!
Kayoko Kuroda is an ordinary and plain girl, who is doing her best behind the scenes, but for some reason, her classmate Shishima-kun, who is dangerous, suddenly approaches her...?!

description.de:
Da geht irgendwas sehr seltsames in der Nachbarschaft vor sich.  
Ja wen wirst du Bescheid sage? Wen willst du zur Hilfe holen? Ähm… irgendein komisches… Mädchen was von sich behauptet, hypnotische Kräfte zu besitzen? Ach so, ja, genau das.  
Jedoch hast du absolut keine Ahnung wo sie ist, und du hast ihr auch nicht Bescheid gegeben.  
Was wird nun aus dir werden, da er da ist…?
description.en:
There's something strange, in the neighborhood.  
Who you gonna call? Uhm. Some strange cute hypnotist girl.  
And you have no clue who she is, and you didn't call her.  
  


---
description.ru:
Каково это, когда привычный мир рушится в одночасье? Кто друг, а кто враг?
Можно ли доверять себе, когда сам теряешься в круговороте пугающих и необъяснимых событий? А может быть, ты сам и есть их источник?
Главный герой — обычный корейский парень, живущий с пожилой матерью в крохотной квартирке, обнаружил, что люди вокруг внезапно изменились. Некие зловещие существа без лишнего шума захватили целый город, а, возможно, даже страну или мир. Но главный герой не собирается сидеть сложа руки и, объединившись с загадочной гипнотизёршей, решает дать отпор неведомым тварям.

description.en: This manga tells parts of the story that are not included in the main Junketsu no Maria manga. It once again features the witch Maria, who lives in France during the Hundred Years War in France. The manga begins with the meeting of Viv, who is an English witch, and Maria.
An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 9 -  The JoJoLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Parte 9 - Las JOJOLandias

altTitles.pl: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Część 9 - The JoJoLands

altTitles.fr: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Partie 9 - The JOJOLands

altTitles.pt-br: A Estranha Aventura de JoJo, Parte 9: As JoJoLândias

altTitles.it: Le Bizzarre Avventure di JoJo: Le JOJOLands

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第9部 ザ・ジョジョランズ

description.en:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
description.hu:
Ez a Jojo's Bizarre Adventure kilencedik történetíve.

O'ahu, napjainkban. Dua Lipa a trendi előadó és a COVID még mindig a fő gond. Ezen a szigeten él egy 15 éves srác, Jodio Joestar. Bátyával és édesanyjával él, dílerként dolgozik és bizonyos illegális anyagokat árul. Egy nap, a főnöke mutat neki egy kiválló fogást: egy japán személy Hawaiira érkezett egy hat millió dollárt érő gyémánttal. Normális esetben lehetetlen lenne ellopni, de akinek standje van...

Ez egy fiatal fiú és az ő küldetésének a története, hogy gazdag legyen.
description.it: O'ahu, oggi. Dua Lipa è la musicista di tendenza e il COVID è ancora una delle principali preoccupazioni. Su quest'isola vive un ragazzo di 15 anni di nome Jodio Joestar. Vive con il fratello e la madre e fa lo spacciatore di alcune sostanze illegali. Un giorno, il suo datore di lavoro arriva e gli mostra un'eccellente scoperta: un giapponese è sbarcato alle Hawaii con un diamante del valore di oltre sei milioni di dollari. Normalmente sarebbe impossibile da rubare, ma per qualcuno con una posizione... Questa è la storia di un ragazzo e della sua ricerca della ricchezza.
description.uk:
Дев’ята сюжетна арка «Неймовірних пригод Джоджо». Оаху, теперішній час. Дуа Ліпа – популярна музикантка, а COVID-19 досі викликає серйозне занепокоєння. На цьому острові мешкає 15-річний хлопчик на ім'я Джодіо Джостар. Живе з братом і матір'ю, торгує певними забороненими речовинами. Одного разу його бос прийшов до нього і показав неймовірну знахідку: японець висадився на Гаваях з діамантом вартістю понад шість мільйонів доларів! Зазвичай, вкрасти таку коштовність було б неможливо, але для того, хто має стенд… 
Це історія про молодого хлопця та його прагнення розбагатіти.
description.es-la: Cierto japonés ingresó a la isla de Hawái con un diamante de valor de 6 millones de dólares. En la isla de Oahu vive un chico llamado Jodio Joestar, cuya meta es arrebatar el diamante de las manos de esa persona. Junto a sus asociados, irán a la quinta de esa persona. Sin embargo, ¿Qué misterios les esperan?

description.en:
On the planet Aqua, a world once known as Mars, Mizunashi Akari has just made her home in the town of Neo-VENEZIA, a futuristic imitation of the ancient city of Venice. The technology of "Man Home" (formerly Earth) has not entirely reached this planet, and Akari is alone, having no contact with family or friends. Nonetheless, the town, with its charming labyrinths of rivers and canals, becomes Akari's new infatuation, along with the dream of becoming a full-fledged gondolier. Reverting to a more "primitive" lifestyle and pursuing a new trade, the character of Akari becomes both adventurous and heartwarming all at once.  


---

**Links:**
- [Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/aquaria2go)  
- [Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=5504)  
- [Anime Season 2 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6425)  
- [OVA on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=7818)  
- [Anime Season 3 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=8657)  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16769)

Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
description.fa:
هانتر‌ها، افراد کنجکاوی که به دنبال گنج‌ها، مجرم‌های خطرناک، مکان‌های ناشناخته و اسرارآمیز، جانوران افسانه‌ای و... هستند. البته برای دست یابی به این موقعیت نیاز به مجوزی است که در بین هر صدهزار نفر تنها یک نفر می‌تواند در آزمون آن موفق شود.
این داستان درمورد چهار نوجوانه که در آزمون هانترها با هم روبه‌رو می‌شوند:
گون، پسری که به دنبال پدرش می‌گردد. کیلوا، پسری که می‌خواهد زندگی جدیدی را شروع کند. لئوریو، پسری که قصد دارد پزشک شود و کوراپیکا، پسری که می‌خواهد انتقام قبیله خود‌ را بگیرد.
description.pt: Hunters são uma raça especial, dedicada a rastrear tesouros, animais mágicos, e até mesmo outros homens. Mas tais atividades requerem uma licença, e menos de um em cem mil pode passar no exame de qualificação esgotante. Aqueles que não passam tem acesso a áreas restritas, lojas de incríveis informações, bem como o direito de chamar-se de Hunters.
description.pt-br:
A série conta a história de Gon Freecss, um garoto de 12 anos que pretende se tornar um Hunter, um caçador de tesouros, lugares perdidos e criaturas estranhas.

Contudo, ao contrário da maioria dos Hunters que procuram fama e dinheiro, o herói da história tem uma motivação maior para querer ser um caçador – encontrar seu pai – um dos mais famosos hunters do mundo.

Mas não é qualquer um que pode se tornar um Hunter. Para poder praticar essa reconhecida profissão, é necessário ter uma licença especial – e para tirá-la é preciso passar – e sobreviver – a exames com milhares de inscritos. Uma vez aprovado e com sua licença Hunter em mãos, o caçador passa a ter direito a acessar áreas restritas, informações secretas e consegue acumular facilmente uma grande fortuna de acordo com seus feitos ? incluindo ir atrás de Hunters que usam seus poderes para objetivos escusos.

description.en:
Civilization is dead, but Chito and Yuuri are still alive. 
So they hop aboard their Kettenkrad motorbike and aimlessly wander the ruins of the world they once knew. 
Day after hopeless day, they look for their next meal and fuel for their ride. 
But as long as they are together, even an existence as bleak as theirs has a ray or two of sunshine in it, 
whether they're sucking down their fill of soup or hunting for machine parts to tinker with. 
The experiences and feelings these two girls share in a world full of nothing give them something to live for…  
  
---
- **Won the Seiun Award for Best Comic in 2019**
description.id:
Peradaban tewas, tapi Chito dan Yuuri masih hidup. Jadi mereka naik sepeda motor Kettenkrad tersayang mereka dan bermondar-mandir tanpa tujuan reruntuhan dunia yang mereka dulu kenal. Hari demi hari tanpa harapan, mereka mencari makanan berikut mereka dan bensin untuk kendaraan mereka. Tapi selama mereka berdua bersama, bahkan kehidupan seguram mereka masih ada sedikit kesenangan di dalamnya, entah minum sup entah mencari bagian-bagian mesin untuk menggerumit. Untuk dua putri di dalam dunia kosong, pengalaman dan perasaan keduanya bersama ada memberi mereka alasan untuk hidup...

- Pemenang Penghargaan Seiun (Nebula) Jepang dalam kategori Komik/Manga terbaik di 2019.
description.ru:
Мир будущего. Человеческая цивилизация достигла невероятного технологического прогресса и однажды построила себе гигантские многоуровневые города, в которых проживало огромное количество людей. Однако через какое-то время началась война, после которой человечество оказалось на грани вымирания.
Спустя много лет в одном из таких городов мы встречаем Тито и Юри. Эти две маленькие девочки изо дня в день путешествуют на своём модифицированном Kettenkrad в поисках пропитания и ресурсов.
Движимые желанием забраться на самую вершину этого опустевшего города-исполина, они постоянно сталкиваются со всё новыми и новыми загадочными сооружениями, памятниками истории и культуры и даже с некоторыми другими выжившими. Что же будет ждать их в конце этой длинной дороги?
description.uk: Дівчата Чіто та Юурі — певно, останні вцілілі після війни, що перетворила людську цивілізацію на руїну. Не маючи більше власного дому, дівчата блукають містом на гусеничному мотоциклі «Кеттенкрад», постійно шукаючи ресурси задля виживання. Утім, попри безпросвітне майбутнє, дівчата однаково знаходять способи розважити себе впродовж цієї меланхолійної подорожі.
description.pt-br: A civilização está morta, mas Chito e Yuuri ainda estão vivas. Então elas sobem a bordo de sua amada moto Kettenkrad e calmamente vagam pelas ruínas do mundo. Dia após dia sem esperança, elas procuram a próxima refeição e acumulam combustível para seguir em frente. Mas enquanto elas estiverem juntas, até uma existência tão sombria como esta tem um ou dois raios de sol a brilhar, mesmo que estejam tomando as últimas gotas de uma sopa ou à caça de peças para seu veículo se mexer. Para duas garotas em um mundo cheio de nada, as experiências e os sentimentos que compartilham são a sua força para viver.

description.en:
15-year-old Alfred Saionji, heir to the venerable Saionji family, spends his days striving to become a first-class gentleman while enduring strict family rules.

His solace comes from his maid, Magly. Thanks to her, a cool and beautiful maid, Alfred's life has become colorful, but...

In fact, her true identity is a vampire. Once she sees or sucks blood, her very naughty nature comes out, and Alfred immediately has his blood sucked at her command...

This is a love story between a boy who seeks the strength to protect a girl and a clumsy, naughty vampire maid who is in love with him.
description.ja:
由緒正しき西園寺家の跡取りである15歳の西園寺アルフレッドは、厳しい家訓に耐えながらも一流の紳士になるべく毎日を過ごしていた。
そんな彼の癒しは彼付きのメイドのマグリー。
クールな美少女メイドである彼女のおかげでアルフレッドの生活は彩りのあるものになっていたが…。
実は彼女の正体は吸血鬼。ひとたび血を見たり吸ったりしてしまうと、すごくHな本性が顔を出し、たちまちアルフレッドは彼女の言いなりに血を吸われてしまうのだった…。

これは一人の女の子を守れる強さを求める少年と、彼のことを恋い慕う不器用でHな吸血鬼メイドとの、"恋"の物語である。

title.en: Haikyu!! - Gūzen ni mo Oikawa o koroshite shimatta oretachi wa (Doujinshi)

altTitles.ja-ro: Gūzen ni mo Oikawa o koroshite shimatta oretachi wa

altTitles.ja: 偶然にも及川を殺してしまった俺たちは

altTitles.vi: Chúng tôi đã lỡ giết Oikawa

description.en: <http://tasukeyashibeta.blog.fc2.com/>

description.vi:
10 năm trước, bầy hổ ở Núi Trắng dưới sự bảo vệ của vua Young Eung đã bị loài Chu Yi tấn công và tàn sát. Dù đến hiện trường cuộc thảm sát muộn màng nhưng vua Young Eung cùng em trai Lông Mày Trắng đã phát hiện ra một hổ con còn sống sót và nhà vua đặt tên cho nó là San Goon.

7 năm sau, khi thủ lĩnh tộc Chu Yi lại một lần nữa tấn công bầy hổ trên Núi Trắng, vua Young Eung trong cơn phẫn nộ đã tàn sát toàn bộ tộc Chu Yi. Tuy nhiên, Lông Mày Trắng đã lén tha mạng cho thủ lĩnh Chu Yi.

Sau trận chiến, thủ lĩnh Chu Yi mất trí nhớ và bị biến thành một chiến binh trừ ma, trong khi đó, vua Young Eung đột ngột biến mất. Để bảo vệ con trai của nhà vua là Arangsa khỏi sự truy đuổi của các thế lực tà ác, San Goon (hổ thần) đã đưa cậu đến nương nhờ nhà Mi Ho, cựu đội trưởng đội cận vệ của nhà vua nhưng đã bị phế truất...

Điều gì sẽ chờ đón họ? Mời các bạn đón đọc để khám phá nhé!

altTitles.ja: 和歌ちゃんは今日もあざとい

altTitles.en: A Hidden Side to my Crush

description.en: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
description.ja:
彼女を作ろうと意気込むDT（童貞）な大学１年生・友哉。同じサークルの癒やし系美少女・桜庭和歌と親しくなるものの、勇気が出ずなかなか第一歩を踏み出せずにいた。
そんなある日、友哉は和歌の「別の一面」を目撃してしまい…？

title.en: My Harem Consists Entirely of Female Demon Villains

altTitles.zh: 我的后宫全是反派魔女

altTitles.zh-ro: Wo De Hougong Quan Shi Fanpai Monü

description.en: I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!

altTitles.en: 東京クレイジーパラダイス

description.en: It's the year 2020 AD, and Tokyo II is a city infested with crime. Women can no longer go out in the streets alone without being victimized. Not wanting their daughter to suffer the same fate, Tsukasa Kozuki's cop parents raise her as a boy. When they are suddenly killed by one of the yakuza's in-fights, Tsukasa is left orphaned on the streets along with her three brothers. With no other options, she goes to the only person she can think of for help: pokerface Ryuji Shirogami, her classmate of 8 years and also the head leader of the powerful yakuza group, Kuryugumi. Ryuji, whose father was also a victim of the same yakuza fight, agrees to take her on as his personal bodyguard. As they set out to find their enemy, Ryuji slaps an increasing amount of debt onto Tsukasa, using all manner of ploys to keep the reluctant Tsukasa by his side.
description.tr: Hikâye, M.S. 2020’de Tokyo’da ebeveynlerini kaybetmenin yükünü atlatmaya çalışan birinin nasıl borç batağına saplandığını anlatmaktadır. Aynı zamanda borcunu ödeyemeyen, evi elinden alınmış, bedenini de şerefini de Shirogami Ryuji’ye adamış Kozuki Tsukasa’nın da hikâyesidir.

description.en:
Blond, hip, pragmatic, and cool, Ginji Amano has the power to generate currents with his body like an electric eel. Brunette, equally hip, bespectacled, and rambunctious, Ban Mido has the mystically mysterious "Evil Eye," the power to create illusions in the minds of his foes. Together, they are the GetBackers, the best retrieval team in the world. They can get back anything taken from clients, and their success rate is (almost) 100%!  
  
However, first they have to get some clients–and soon–or this spry detective duo will starve on the streets!
description.pt-br: Ban Mido e Ginji Amano são um grupo de recuperação conhecido como "GetBackers." Ban possui dois poderes especiais: o "Snake Bite" (suas mãos podem fazer uma pressão de até 200kg) e o "Jagan" (qualquer um que olhar nos seus olhos será aprisionado em pesadelos e alucinações poderosas). Ginji, por outro lado, tem a habilidade de gerar milhares de volts de eletricidade a partir do seu corpo. Juntos, eles administram um serviço freelance que propõe recuperar qualquer coisa perdida ou roubada de um cliente - e, segundo eles, a taxa de sucesso é de 100%.

title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

description.en:
Short manga posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter. 

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.

title.en: Watashi no Hara no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Tai no Naka no Bakemono

altTitles.vi: Con quái vật trong tử cung của tôi

description.en:
Awaken the "malice" sleeping inside you.

Chinatsu is a middle school girl who's an honor student and highly trusted by her teacher. She gets along with her friends, and she spends her days happily without hating anyone. 

However, on her period, Chinatsu realized it. That she hated her homeroom advisor, and she's extremely irritated by her surroundings. She had put a lid on her own feelings and pretended not to notice, but when she became aware of it, the "monster" inside of her begins to rampage and reveal her true nature.

(Source: Comic-Days)
description.ja: 貴方の中の“悪意”を目覚めさす。衝撃のサスペンス!!優等生で、先生からの信頼も厚い女子中学生の神城千夏。友達とも仲良く、誰のことも嫌いになんてならない幸せな日々を過ごしていた…はずだった。しかし、千夏は気づいてしまった。担任の塚本のことが嫌いだと、周りに対してとてもいらいらしていることを。フタをして、見ないふりをしていた自分の気持ちを自覚した時、千夏の中にいた“化け物”が暴れ出し、本性を現し始めた。
description.vi:
Sẽ ra sao nếu một ngày những biến cố, bất công của cuộc đời liên tiếp ập đến, để rồi đánh thức con ác ma đang trú ngụ trong trái tim bạn?
Kamishiro Chinatsu, nữ sinh cấp hai, là một học sinh giỏi, đồng thời còn là lớp trưởng được giáo viên hết mực tín nhiệm. Một cô bé hòa đồng với bạn bè và trải qua những ngày vui vẻ mà không ghét lấy một ai.
Tuy nhiên, Chinatsu nhận thấy cảm xúc căm ghét của cô bé dành cho Tsukada, giáo viên chủ nhiệm của mình đang một lớn dần, đến mức khiến cô bé chán ghét tất cả mọi thứ xung quanh. Nhận ra chuyện này, cô bé đã tìm cách che đậy và quay lưng lại với nó. Nhưng rồi "con quái vật" vốn trú ngụ bên trong Chinatsu bắt đầu hành động và bộc lộ bản chất thật của mình, thứ mà cô bé đã luôn muốn trốn tránh.

altTitles.vi: Dõi Theo Màn Đêm Trong Em

description.en:
Mayo, who is gloomy and lacks self-confidence, is currently active as the bright and cheerful popular VTuber "Mahiru".

The more Mahiru, the polar opposite of his true self, is loved, the more the reality of being alone becomes painful...

Even his manager Ogino, who praises him a lot and spoils him, is probably only looking at Mahiru, not the real "me".

Because he knows this, he can't take Ogino's words "I love you" seriously and wish to be loved by him so much...!

However, as if seeing through Mayo's "desire to be bullied", Ogino asks, "Shall I bully you instead?", revealing the depths of his body trembling with anticipation...!?

A sweet, sadistic, caring manager x an unconsciously masochistic, gloomy VTuber

Development of the mind and body! Pampered Love Days!!!!

Riat, caught up in her husband's treason, faces death.

After repeatedly returning to the past at the cost of half her lifespan, she finally breaks the cycle by offering her husband’s head to the emperor.

With only 1 year and 3 months left to live, her one wish is—

"I’m going to fall in love."

At last, an announcement spreads across the entire empire: a competition to find Riat’s new husband, with a grand prize of 1 billion gold.

Candidates begin to flood in, but suspicious figures also start gathering around her…

altTitles.ja: ウィッチ ウォッチ

description.en: Morihito, a boy with the strength of an ogre, is about to start living together with his childhood friend Niko, who is training to be a witch. Niko's magic leads to all sorts of unpredictable trouble, and with two teens under one roof… Let the fantastical antics begin! Magical comedy series by Kenta Shinohara creator of SKET DANCE and Astra Lost in Space.
description.ne:
निको वाकात्सुकीले आफ्नो छ वर्षको बोक्सीको तालिम पूरा गरिसकेकी छिन् र उनी आफैं सहरमा सर्दैछिन्। नयाँ बोक्सीको रूपमा, उसले आफ्नो साथ दिनको लागि परिचित छनोट गर्नुपर्छ। यद्यपि, अन्य बोक्सीहरू भन्दा फरक, उनी गैर-जन्तु परिचित छान्न चाहन्छिन्। मोरिहितो "मोई" ओतोगी भन्दा राम्रो साथी कोही छैन - उनको बाल्यकालको साथी जो एक औघ राक्षस हुन्। मोरिहितो उनको नोकर हुनुको कडा विरोध गर्छन्, तर उनले बोक्सीको आदेशको अवज्ञा गरेमा श्रापले उनलाई अनौठो गाई-बाघ हाइब्रिडमा फर्काउनेछ भनेर थाहा पाएपछि उनले आफ्नो भाग्यलाई अनिच्छुकतासाथ स्वीकार गर्छन्।

मोरिहितोका बुबा व्यवसायिक यात्राको लागि जानुभएको कारण र निकोकी आमा बोक्शीहरुको पवित्र भूमिमा पछाडि रहनुभएको कारण, दुई किशोरहरूले आफूलाई एउटै छानामुनि सँगै बसेको भेट्टाए। जबकि निको आफ्नो क्रशसँग बाँच्न पाउँदा उत्साहित छिन्, मोरिहितोले पत्ता लगाए कि उनको जादुई गतिविधि र समग्र अनाड़ीपनले समाधान भन्दा बढी समस्याहरू सिर्जना गर्छ। एक वर्ष भित्र निकोमा आउने भविष्यवाणी गरिएको प्रकोपको साथ, मोरिहितोले आफ्नो अंगरक्षकको रूपमा रक्षा गर्नको लागि सक्दो गर्नुपर्दछ र साथै आफ्नो परिचितको रूपमा आफ्नो कर्तव्यहरू पालना गर्नुपर्नेछ।
description.pt: Morihito, um menino com a força de um ogro, está prestes a começar a viver com sua amiga de infância, Niko, que está treinando para ser feiticeira. A magia de Niko os leva a todos os tipos de problemas imprevisíveis, e com dois adolescentes sob o mesmo teto… Que as travessuras fantásticas comecem! Uma série de comédia de magia de Kenta Shinohara, criador de SKET DANCE e Astra Perdido no Espaço.
description.ru:
Морихито, парень с демонической силой, начинает жить вместе со своей подругой детства Нико, которая учится быть ведьмой. Магия Нико приводит ко всяким непредсказуемым проблемам, а уж когда два подростка остаются под одной крышей… да начнутся фантастические выходки!  
Магический комедийный сериал от Кенты Синохары, автора «SKET DANCE» и «Астра, затерянная в космосе».
description.uk:
Моріхіто, хлопець з силою оні, ось-ось почне жити разом зі своєю подругою дитинства Ніко, яка навчається на відьму. Магія Ніко призводить до всіляких непередбачуваних неприємностей, а коли двоє підлітків живуть під одним дахом... Фантастичні витівки починаються!
Магічний комедійний серіал від Кента Шінохари, творця “SKET DANCE” та "Загублена в космосі Астра".

title.en: Uchi no Hentai Maid ni Osowareteru

altTitles.en: My Hentai Maid is Assaulting Me
My Perverted Maid is Attacking Me

altTitles.ja: うちの変態メイドに襲われてる

description.en: Spring has come. I, Haruto, am now a university student, and I'm living on my own in an apartment.However, my father suddenly sent me a "maid" because he was worried about me. This maid is a huge pervert with a dirty mind who spends every day assaulting me with her provocative behavior.
description.fr: Le printemps est arrivé. Moi, Haruto, est maintenant étudiant à l'université et je vis seul dans un appartement. Cependant, mon père m'a soudainement envoyé une "bonne" parce qu'il s'inquiétait pour moi. Cette bonne est une énorme perverse à l'esprit sale qui passe tous ses jours à m'agresser avec son comportement provocateur.
description.zh: 我家女仆是个变态，她会在我睡懒觉时候给我个早安咬叫我起床！

altTitles.ja: ストリートファイター アンソロジーコミック (GARLAND COMICS)
チャラ男くんと清楚ちゃん

altTitles.ja-ro: #Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachide wa Irarenai

altTitles.ja: #クマとウサギは友達ではいられない

description.en:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.
___
**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.

title.en: Boku to Kanojo no Renai Mokuroku

altTitles.th: แคตตาล็อกแคตตารัก

altTitles.ja: ボクとカノジョの恋愛目録

description.en:
Mizuhara Ritsu loves both the 2D beauties of eroge and elementary school students. Also, his friend Bungo is jealous of how he seems to be surrounded by cute girls–there's his little sister Miri, his tsundere childhood friend Akari, and kuudere Hatori.  
  
One day, Bungo tells Ritsu about an anonymous blogger who writes about the future, and whose vague online self-description seems to match Ritsu. While initially assuming it to be a prank, Ritsu ends up letting his actions be guided by the blog's horoscope-like hints for the upcoming day…
description.ja: 「小学生と二次元好き」のため、学校の女の子たちは恋愛対象外だという主人公。ある日謎のブログを発見、そこに書かれた予言通りに行動した彼は、女の子と急接近!?　まさかの３次元恋愛体質に何故か変身……だと!?
description.pt-br: Ritsu é um cara lolicon, e adora garotas 2D , mas em um certo dia ele descobre um blog que revela o seu futuro e que fará a sua vida virar de cabeça para baixo.

altTitles.ja: 大人になれない僕らは

altTitles.es-la: Nosotros que no podemos convertirnos en adultos

description.en:
The latest work from the author of "The Diary of a Commuting Student". It's a silly and endless story about how some kids kill time by repeating the 7th of July every day. A time-loop love story of two high school students trapped in "Eternal Youth"!

(Source: Young Magazine)
description.es-la: ¡El último trabajo de Jo Fujita en Commuting Student Diary! Esta es nuestra tonta e interminable historia de cómo matamos el tiempo una y otra vez el 7 de julio. ¡Una historia de amor en bucle temporal de dos estudiantes de preparatoria atrapados en una "eterna juventud"!

description.en: Horny boss and underpaid salary man.
description.es: Una jefa calenturienta y un asalariado mal pagado.
description.es-la: Una jefa calenturienta y un asalariado mal pagado.

description.en:
The Indigo League: the ultimate challenge for Pokémon trainers. Structured like a massive tournament, anyone eager to show off their Pokémon can participate, from rookies to gym leaders to even the Elite Four themselves.  
  
This is the story of Red, Blue, and Green, three friends who decide to partake in the tournament.
The space ship "Leviathan" was once the arena for a cruel battle of survival. The only hope: a cryogenic chamber - but there's only room for one person

title.en: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.ja: 生意気なギャル姉を解らせる話

altTitles.ja-ro: Namaiki na Gyaru Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi

altTitles.en: The Story of Making My Cheeky Gal Sister Understand
The Story of Making My Cheeky Gyaru Sister Understand

altTitles.es-la: El día que decidí hacer entender a mi descarada hermana gal a mi manera

description.en: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
description.ja: 口を開けば暴言ばかりで、問題行動が絶えない姉。 彼女に痺れを切らし、主人公が踏み出した“計画”とは---??!
description.es-la:
Su hermana siempre dice cosas hirientes y cuyos comportamientos problemáticos nunca cesan, el protagonista, cansado de ella, da un paso adelante con un "plan"
¿Cuál será...?

title.en: Yuki no Niizuma wa Boku to Tokeaitai

altTitles.ja: 雪の新妻は僕と溶け合いたい

altTitles.en: My New Snow Bride Wants To Melt Together With Me

altTitles.th: เจ้าสาวหิมะมือใหม่ อยากหลอมรวมใจไปกับผม

description.en:
From the same author who made Renai Boukun and many others!

Yusuke Sakanoi is a young man who earns a living as a part-timer. One day he is rescued by a mysterious beauty when he was lying down due to a heat stroke. Yusuke started looking for her to return her lost hat, but when he managed to find her, she was standing in a brothel!? Her name is Ginka, she is a Yuki-Onna who came to the city in search of a husband and was going to work at the brothel, a secret feeding ground for the Yuki-Onna! In an interesting turn of events, she and Yusuke somehow become a couple…?! What is Yusuke's fate?!

A cute and sexually knowledgeable Yuki-Onna and a part-timer. This is a newlywed romantic comedy!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Raw](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/49466)
description.id:
Suatu hari, seorang pemuda, Sakanoi Yusuke, yang mencari nafkah sebagai pekerja paruh waktu, diselamatkan dari sengatan panas oleh kecantikan misterius.  
 Sakanoi mencarinya. Dia berhasil menemukannya, tapi dia berada di soapland.  
 Namanya Ginka. Dia adalah Yuki onna pemula yang datang ke kota untuk mencari roh dan suaminya di Soapland, Soapland adalah tempat makan bagi Yuki onna!  
 Entah bagaimana,dia dan Ginka bakal menikah untuk pertama kalinya …? Bagaimana nasib Yusuke?  
  
  
Ini adalah kisah tentang wanita salju yang lucu berpengetahuan luas dan pasangan semu! Komedi cinta yang sedikit nakal dan mengerikan tentang pengantin baru!

title.en: Kono Naka ni Hitori, Ore no Yome ga Iru

altTitles.ja: この中に1人、俺の嫁がいる

altTitles.ja-ro: Kono Naka ni 1-ri, Ore no Yome ga Iru

altTitles.en: One of Them is My Wife

altTitles.id: Salah Satu Dari Mereka Adalah Istriku

description.en:
For the sake of finding clues about his younger twin brother who suddenly went missing, the protagonist changed his identity and infiltrated the academy his brother was attending.

However, what clearly came to light there was a surprising truth! His brother had multiple fiancées...?

(Source: Ganma)
description.id: Souya seorang laki-laki yang menggantikan posisi adiknya yang tiba-tiba menghilang, Terlebih lagi dia menemukan fakta yang mengejutkan bahwa adiknya memiliki banyak tunangan?
description.ja: 突如失踪した双子の弟の手がかりを得る為、入れ替わって学園に潜入することになった主人公。 しかし、そこで明らかになるのは驚愕の事実！ 弟には複数人の婚約者が居て……？

description.en: Julia, who was born an orphan, was killed in exchange for falling in love with the Young Master of the Marjoram Family. But when she opened her eyes, at the same location as any other day, she was rescued by the Commander of the Imperial Army, ‘Carus’... She was hit by a curse of being unable to die, and this is now her eighth life. After realizing that she would be stuck in the loop forever if she didn't take down the Marquis, she became a servant within the Palace to utilize the Royal Family’s power to demolish the Marjoram Family in her eighth life. “Isn’t this how we’re supposed to plot revenge?”

altTitles.th: มือใหม่หัดรัก

description.en: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
description.ru: В один прекрасный день Ибуки Синтаро поручили сделать ящик для предложений только потому, что он состоит в художественном кружке. Пока он работал с непривычными для него инструментами, он заметил на себе сверлящий взгляд устрашающей девчонки. Неожиданно она забирает у него пилу и энергичными движениями начинает резать доску! Так начинаются отношения между мальчишкой-художником и девчонкой-мастерицей!
description.th: “ในวันหนึ่ง ขณะที่กำลังทำงานอุปกรณ์ในห้องศิลปะ มีเด็กสาวที่มีหน้าตาน่ากลัวกำลังเฝ้ามองมาที่ผม...!?” เรื่องราวความรักคอมเมดี้ระหว่างสาวช่างฝีมือกับหนุ่มสายศิลป์!?
description.pt-br:
Um dia, quando eu estava fazendo material escolar na sala de arte, uma garota muito assustadora estava olhando para mim...!? 

Menina do artesanato vs. garoto da arte comédia romântica!!

description.en:
Ayasaki Hayate, 16, the world's unluckiest boy.  
Working hard as a child for food and school fees, his unemployed and indebted parents sold him to the yakuza for his internal organs. After temporarily escaping the criminals and contemplating the benefits of a life of crime, he was saved by a wealthy young girl, who now employs him as a live-in butler.

title.en: Yuusha Shoukan ni Makikomareta kedo, Isekai wa Heiwa deshita

altTitles.ja: 勇者召喚に巻き込まれたけど、異世界は平和でした

altTitles.en: I Got Caught Up in a Hero Summons, but the Other World was at Peace!

description.en:
The other world was… at Peace.  
A kind world where the three races, the Spirit World’s Magical Races, the Celestial World’s Divine Races, the Human World’s Human Races, they are kind neighbours to each other, with everyone living a peaceful and fulfilling life.  
  
But although I wished to peacefully spend a year before my return, for some reason, the heavyweights of this world keeps gathering around me, and…
description.ja: 心に陰を落とす青年、快人が飛ばされたのは争いのない「平和な異世界」だった！？魔族の少女、クロムエイナとの出会いをきっかけに動き始める、異世界成長記録。
description.pt-br:
O outro mundo estava... em paz. Um mundo gentil onde as três raças, as raças mágicas do Mundo Espiritual, as raças divinas do Mundo Celestial e as raças humanas do Mundo Humano, são vizinhos gentis entre si, com todos vivendo uma vida pacífica e plena.

Mas, embora eu desejasse passar um ano em paz antes de retornar, por algum motivo, os poderosos deste mundo continuam se reunindo ao meu redor e...

title.en: The Saga of Tanya the Evil

altTitles.de: Die Militärischen Aufzeichnungen eines kleinen Mädchens

altTitles.th: บันทึกสงคราม ของยัยเผด็จการ

altTitles.es: Crónicas de una niña en guerra

altTitles.it: La saga di Tanya la malvagia
Le cronache militari di una ragazzina

altTitles.pt: Crônicas Militares de uma Pequena Garota

altTitles.en: The Military Chronicles of a Little Girl

altTitles.es-la: La Saga de Tanya la Malvada

description.en:
A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army.

Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.  

Adapted from Light Novel of same name.  

---

**Note:** Manga and Light Novel Licensed in English by Yen Press as "The Saga of Tanya the Evil".
description.es-la: Una joven chica que lucha en el frente de una guerra. Tiene el pelo rubio, ojos azules y una piel blanca, casi transparente, y es conocida por moverse como el viento en el campo de batalla. Ella es Tanya Degurechaff y se encarga de dirigir al ejército. Solía ser un asalariado de élite en Japón, pero debido a la ira de un dios, renació como una niña pequeña. Tanya lo da todo por avanzar en su carrera militar y se convertirá en la maga más poderosa del ejército imperial.

title.en: The Ghost and the Exhausted Office Worker

description.en:
A story about a ghost and the exhausted office worker he watches over as he gradually learns to find meaning in his life.

Original by [@yukiyuki_nkym](https://twitter.com/yukiyuki_nkym) on Twitter.

title.en: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party wo Kumimashita!

altTitles.ja: 勇者に全部奪われた俺は勇者の母親とパーティを組みました！

altTitles.zh-hk: 被勇者奪取全部的我，和勇者的母親組成了隊伍！

altTitles.zh: 被勇者踢出队伍的我，最后和他们的妈妈组队了！

altTitles.id: Pahlawan Mengambil Segalanya Dariku, Jadi Aku Menikahi Ibunya!

altTitles.tr: Kahraman Her Şeyimi Elimden Çaldı, Ben de Annesiyle Parti Yaptım!

altTitles.en: Betrayed by the Hero, I Formed a MILF Party with His Mom!
The Hero Took Everything from Me, So I Partied with the Hero’s Mother!

description.en:
A young man wants to marry the mothers of the hero's party!

As a member of the hero's party Ceres, has set out to defeat the demon king. But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party.

All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Shizuko, the hero's mother, being sold as a slave?!

The unreasonably expelled young man's Isekai mama harem is born!!
description.id:
Seorang pemuda ingin menikahi ibu dari kelompok pahlawan—

Sebagai anggota kelompok pahlawan Ceres sang tokoh utama, berangkat untuk mengalahkan raja iblis.
Namun suatu hari, dia tiba-tiba di keluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan oleh sang pahlawan,
Seorang diri, Ceres mencari budak rumah tangga untuk merawatnya. Namun apa yang dia lihat di pasar budak adalah Nyonya Shizuko, ibu dari sang pahlawan, dijual sebagai budak—??

Harem Isekai yang tak masuk akal dari pemuda yang dikeluarkan dari kelompok pahlawan lahir!!
description.ja:
少年が結婚したいのは、
勇者パーティのお母さんたちでした――

勇者パーティの一員として
魔王の倒す旅に出ている主人公・セレス。

だがある日突然、勇者ゼクトからクビ宣告を受け、
パーティを抜けることに。

一人になったセレスは、
身の回りの世話役として家事奴隷探しへ。

その奴隷市場で見かけたのは
奴隷として売られた、勇者の母親である静子さんの姿が――？？

理不尽に追放された少年の
異世界ママハーレムが産声を上げる！！
description.pt-br: Ceres e seus amigos de infância criaram um grupo de aventureiros nomeado de “luz da esperança”, mas depois que Zect, um de seus amigos, se tornou o grande herói, ele expulsou Ceres do grupo. Agora, só restava ao extasiado Ceres retornar para seu vilarejo. Contudo, quando foi comprar uma escrava para auxiliá-lo, Ceres se deparou com Shizuko, a mãe do grande herói Zect!
